newsitem.title: USA: Unocal sees more Thailand gas production.
newsitem.headline: Unocal sees more Thailand gas production.

text.p: Unocal Corp said Monday gross natural gas production by its Unocal Thailand Ltd unit is expected to average nearly 990 million cubic feet per day during the fourth quarter, 35 percent above the average gas production rate for the first nine months of 1996.
Associated condensate production is expected to average about 32,500 barrels per day, the company said.
The company also said that gross production exceeded 1.0 billion cubic feet per day for the first time since the company began operations in the Gulf of Thailand in 1981.
Unocal said it expects average gross production to be at or above 1.0 billion cubic feet per day by the second quarter 1997.
